Html:
If I wish to change the value of a cell in a ComboBoxColumn there are 5 mouse clicks needed to set the value:

  1. click to select the cell
  2. click to initiate the combobox (making the cell editable)
  3. click to activate the dropdown
  4. make a selection in the dropdown
  5. click outside the selected cell to register the value change

Is it possible to reduce the number of clicks?  Is it e.g. possible to  use a single click to do the first three? (i.e. select, start edit and display the dropdown?)

The first two...?

 

Thanx!
